name: Herdicorn
description:
Herdicorn

Your herd of unisheep have gone wild! You have to herd them into their barber fold by using your majestic roar or your trusty unisheep herding pug.

Save as many as you can before they do something stupid..! 

CREDITS

Programming - Søren Bach

Programming/Tech art - Mads Fog

2D Art - Sonja Stangl

Animation and additional art - Simon Holm

Special Thanks - Emil Husted Legene fallen team member who sadly got sick at the beginning, Søren "Chad" Sørensen and the rest of the hangout chill times group <3

Music: 

Still Pickin by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/5707-still-pickin
